lst.name: sentence
lst.str: ETA, a subsidiary of Control Data Corp <CDC>, introduced two machines that are really full-blown supercomputers similar to those sold by Cray Research Inc, the world's biggest supercomputer maker, but at half the price of Cray's cheapest model.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Alliant said profits for the period will be about five cents a share against eight cents last year, although revenues for the period rose to 14.2 mln dlrs from 8.6 mln.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Near-supercomputers have been in existence for only about five years and the two leading manufacturers, Alliant and Convex Computer Corp (CNVX), held two of the most successful initial public offerings last year.

lst.name: sentence
